# vImageConverter_Release

**Function**

Releases a vImage converter.

## Declaration

```swift
void vImageConverter_Release(vImageConverterRef converter);
```

## Discussion

If you create or explicitly retain (see [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vImageConverter_Retain]) a [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vImageConverter] instance, you’re responsible for releasing it when you no longer need it (see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/CoreFoundation/Conceptual/CFMemoryMgmt/CFMemoryMgmt.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000127i]).

## Memory management

- **vImageConverter_Retain**: Retains a vImage converter.
